data.text:
@FutureMikeUX @OriginalBadman_ @pcgamer Well.

Aunt Betty on Facebook is probably a bad source of fact to start things out.
@Haiashy @pcgamer I access Twitter via a PC, not a phone.
@Powered_Stone @duncTTV @Wynny2k @pcgamer you're refering to rape, not pedophilia, look up the difference, rape can also be done by an adult to another adult, get your facts straight

@pcgamer Imagine if i created a vaccine that cures cancer, but it doesn't,  and you can still get cancer, and the govt mandated you get it. Then there was adverse side effects, but you were banned from informing people about it, this is the same thing.
@pcgamer People mad their freedom of speech being hurt by a private company who can dictate how they run it lol
@FutureMikeUX @MatchlessSulik @OriginalBadman_ @pcgamer Imma go on discord and support Nazism >:D
@pcgamer Donâ€™t you love to see freedom of speech going down the drain? Love me some censorship for breakfast 😐

@MatchlessSulik @OriginalBadman_ @pcgamer So who would be the all knowing all good, filtering the right information to the stupid masses? Censorship is like using mustard gas in war, it is fun and rly affective. Until the wind turns... 
Strange times.
@MatchlessSulik @OriginalBadman_ @pcgamer Hmm, based on that you should be banned off of Twitter as you are depicting Putin as a fag which I don't think he is, i.e. you are spreading misinformation.
@pcgamer Pushing political agenda that's it for me for discord uninstalling
